summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 6831, entitled "An Ordinance to regulate plumbing and gas and steam fitting in the City of Seattle, and to provide for testing and inspecting the same, and providing a penalty for any violation of the same", approved May 2, 1901, and Ordinance No. 10164, approved October 14, 1903, and No. 8256, approved June 25, 1902, amendatory thereof, and Ordinance No. 10442, approved June 6, 1904, amendatory of Ordinance No. 10164.
